VariableDescription.Name: SPIN_PHASE
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     TITLE                           ISTP POLAR spin phase CDF
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics
#     SOURCE_NAME                     POLAR>Polar Plasma Laboratory
#     DATA_VERSION                    1
#     DATA_TYPE                       K0>Key Parameter
#     DESCRIPTOR                      SPHA>Spin Phase
#     START_DATE                      1996-03-30T00:00:02.930Z
#     END_DATE                        1996-03-30T23:59:23.330Z
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0182
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 PO_K0_SPHA_00000000_V01
#     TEXT                            To be supplied
#     MODS                            6/4/93 - Original Implementation
#                                     6/8/94 - CCR ISTP 1852, updated CDHF skeleton to CDF standards - JT
#                                     11/10/94 - Correct errors made in ccr 1852.  ICCR 1884
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  PO_K0_SPHA
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Polar Spin Phase Key Parameters
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Polar
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#                                     !___ITM Data including Earth Imaging and Ground-Based
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Ephemeris
#     NSSDC_ID                        xxno-00419
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Polar_spha_Key-Parameters-K0_1min_cdf
#     CDFMAJOR                        COL_MAJOR
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Spin phase EPOCH time
#  2. Spin phase angle
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Fri Dec  2 18:15:09 2016
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#  2. Spin phase angle
#
EPOCH                        SP_ANGLE
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms            rad
25-01-1996 02:06:42.190       0.00000
